item.title: Listing all ASP.NET Core routes
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop ASP.NET Core has a build in class, EndpointDataSource, which contains information about a route, while the IEnumerable<EndpointDataSource> collection, available through dependency injection contains information about all endpoints of an application. Information about a specific endpoint can also be retrieved from the HttpContext for a specific request.
